short_summary: Digital Services Branch requires vendor to modernize AV/VC environments for Project Authorities within Digital Convergence initiatives.
description: The government branch of Procurement Strategy Category Management (PSCM) is requesting professional services to provide expert advice in modernizing audio-visual technology and video conferencing environments for project authorities to support digital convergence efforts. The branch is looking to upgrade and modernize the current audio-visual and video conferencing infrastructure for providing high-quality video conferencing and audio-visual services for project activities. This includes modernizing the current AV/VC systems, devices, and network infrastructure for efficient communication and collaboration among team members. Moreover, the department is planning to increase digital connectivity and resources, strengthen work processes, and enhance collaboration and results among teams for the success of digital convergence initiatives. Key objectives include taxonomy, technical expertise, technology assessments, strategic IT investment requirements, and infrastructure management planning to strengthen digital connectivity and create intelligent networks for teams

full_summary:
### Digital Convergence Program Initiatives - Task and Solutions Professional Services Procurement Strategy

#### Government of Canada Tender Notice

This is a request for proposal (RFP) for the procurement of professional services related to the Digital Convergence program, specifically the modernization of audio-visual and video-conferencing (AV/VC) environments.

#### Tender Details

*   **Reference Number**: cb-914-49718831
*   **Solicitation Number**: 10076694
*   **Closing Date**: 2023-06-02T14:00:00
*   **Expected Contract Start Date**: 2023-07-04
*   **Expected Contract End Date**: 2024-07-03
*   **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Selective Tendering
*   **Notice Type**: RFP against a Supply Arrangement

#### Project Overview

The Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) requires professional services focused on modernizing AV/VC environments to support the Digital Convergence initiatives within the Digital Services Branch. This procurement aims to acquire the services of experts who can provide guidance to Project Authorities to enhance the overall efficiency and effectiveness of the AV/VC environments.

#### Eligibility Criteria

This procurement is open to all eligible contractors. Participants must demonstrate their ability to provide expert guidance on modernizing AV/VC environments and their proven track record of delivering similar services to government clients.

#### Evaluation Criteria

The assessment of proposals will be based on the following criteria:

*   Technical Merit (40%): The evaluation will assess the applicant's expertise, knowledge, and capabilities in relation to the services required.
*   Price (30%): A lower price will be considered as an advantage when awarding the contract.
*   Past Performance (30%): Applicants must demonstrate their successful delivery of similar services to government clients.

#### Contact Information

For more information, please contact:

*   **Name**: Émilie Charbonneau
*   **Email**: [emilie.charbonneau@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:emilie.charbonneau@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
*   **Phone**: (873) 355-4701

#### Additional Resources

The tender documents are available on the [Canadabuys website](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/). [View attachment](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/
